entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid was silenced by Rowle's wand.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix leapt to her feet and looked eagerly from Voldemort to Harry.

entities.name: voldemort

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's wand was against his chest.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake was coiling and uncoiling in the glittering cage behind Voldemort's head.

relationships.description: Rowle silenced Hagrid with his wand.
